column16: antique glassware and furniture as well as knitting. she was preceded in death by her husband
column17: william franklin ward and two brothers
column18: charles lynwood harrison and wilson david harrison. she is survived by her son
column19: richard w. ward and wife diane of charlotte and a granddaughter
